%title /ab/experiments 列出所有的测试

=/ab/experiments =
%toc

==功能 ==
返回测试`Experiments`列表

==URL==
/ab/experiments

==HTTP请求方式==
GET

==请求参数==

=== URL参数 ===
| 参数名    | 值     | 描述         |
|-----------|--------|--------------|
| pageNo    | 数字型 | 查询第几页   |
| pageCount | 数字型 | 一页几条数据 |

==返回格式==
JSON XML

==测试==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl -HAcccept:application/xml https://baseurl/experiments
curl -HAcccept:application/json https://baseurl/experiments
  }}}

==返回结果==
